header.description: No scalar header fields required for this report

rows.description: Job run detail rows with timing, throughput, and latency metrics

semantics: All row tokens are direct column mappings except `row_error`, which formats the `error_pct` numeric column as a percentage display value.
transformations: Format `app_job_runs.error_pct` numeric value as percentage with 2 decimal places for display as `row_error`
